languages.text: "Я ценю вашу заботу. Может, эти небольшие послабления придадут им сил и спасут чью-то жизнь".
"I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."
languages.original_text: "Я ценю вашу заботу. Может, эти небольшие послабления придадут им сил и спасут чью-то жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."
"I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."
"I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."
"I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."
"I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."
"I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."

languages.text: «Agradezco su preocupación. Tal vez estas pequeñas indulgencias les otorguen fuerza y salven alguna vida».
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."

traits.locale_text: «Agradezco su preocupación. Tal vez estas pequeñas indulgencias les otorguen fuerza y salven alguna vida».

languages.text: 「ご心配に感謝します。もしかしたら、このささやかな甘えが彼らに力を与え、誰かの命を救うことになるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."

traits.locale_text: 「ご心配に感謝します。もしかしたら、このささやかな甘えが彼らに力を与え、誰かの命を救うことになるかもしれない」

languages.text: “非常感谢您的关心。或许这短暂的快乐能为他们带来力量，让其中一部分人幸免于难。”
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."

traits.locale_text: “非常感谢您的关心。或许这短暂的快乐能为他们带来力量，让其中一部分人幸免于难。”

languages.text: "Ich weiß Eure Bedenken zu schätzen. Vielleicht verleihen ihnen diese kleinen Gefälligkeiten Stärke und retten jemandem das Leben."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß Eure Bedenken zu schätzen. Vielleicht verleihen ihnen diese kleinen Gefälligkeiten Stärke und retten jemandem das Leben."

languages.text: « Votre sollicitude me touche. Ces petits plaisirs leur donneront peut-être la force de continuer, et, qui sait, peut-être qu'ils permettront de sauver une vie. »
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."

traits.locale_text: « Votre sollicitude me touche. Ces petits plaisirs leur donneront peut-être la force de continuer, et, qui sait, peut-être qu'ils permettront de sauver une vie. »

languages.text: "İlgilendiğiniz için teşekkür ederim. Belki böyle ufak zevkler, onlara güç verip birilerinin hayatını kurtarabilir."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your concern. Perhaps these small indulgences will give them strength and save someone's life."
